content: your 4 needles 5 gusset setup pm and join yarn for knitting in the round if using dpn s place the last 4 of your heel sts on one needle decide if you will be knitting the cabled or using the same needle pick up 9 sts along the ribbed version and proceed to the appropriate side of your heel flap section for the leg now you will be working the 16 sts that have been resting this is the top of the foot continue working these 16 sts in the pattern 2 leg established during the leg portion cabled op- ribbed sock tion should start at row 1 again dont forget row 1 k1 p2 k1 repeat this sequence to end to work the cables every 4th round of row after the 16 top foot sts are worked using a repeat row 1 until leg measures 2 about 24 new needle if using dpn s pick up 9 sts along rounds or until you ve reached your desired the second side of your heel flap knit the length first 4 heel flap sts cabled sock if using dpn s your needles should now be cuff work 4 row of p1 k2 p1 to end situated like so row 1-3 p1 k2 p1 repeat this sequence to needle 1 4 heel sts + 9 sts from flap end of row needle 2 first 8 top of foot sts row 4 p1 c1f p1 repeat this sequence to needle 3 next 8 top of foot sts end of row needle 4 9 sts from flap + 4 heel sts repeat row 1-4 until leg measures 2 about decreasing 24 rounds or until you ve reached your de- sired length make sure you end with row 4 for this portion your rounds/row begin before you work the top foot sts between 3 heel flap needles 1 & 2 place the first 16 sts on one needle you will before beginning to decrease knit to bor be working the row back and forth on these 16 sts for the heel section row 1 k16 foot sts in pattern ssk k to last 2 sts k2tog rs row 1 sl1 k1 to the end of row row 2 k16 foot sts in pattern k to end of ws row 2 sl1 p to end of row row repeat these two row 5 more times for a repeat these 2 row until you have 16 sts for total of 12 row the bottom of the foot 32 sts total 3 6 foot row 1 k16 top foot sts in pattern k to end of row work this row/round for a total of 15 rounds or until desired length 7 toe row 1 knit row 2 ssk k12 k2tog twice 28 sts remain row 3 ssk k10 k2tog twice 24 sts remain row 4 ssk k8 k2tog twice 20 sts remain row 5 ssk k6 k2tog twice 16 sts remain break yarn leaving a long tail
